title: WATCH:  Suspected meteorite over Indiana
description: Scientists are trying to determine if a streak of light and loud boom in Indiana was caused by a meteor.

title: Ken Potts, one of last 2 USS Arizona survivors, dies at 102
description: The Arizona sank during the 1941 Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor.

title: Oklahoma county worried about fallout from racist recording
description: McCurtain County in far southeast Oklahoma has become a tourism hotbed over the last several decades

title: NAACP sues Mississippi over 'separate and unequal policing'
description: GOP gov says violent crime made it necessary to expand patrols of Capitol Police

title: Cruise line let passenger's body decompose, lawsuit says
description: A widow is suing a cruise line, alleging that it let her husband's body decompose after he died of a heart attack

title: Drug suspect takes off with sheriffs' meth after sting fails
description: Authorities say a suspected drug trafficker is on the run with nearly 60 pounds of methamphetamine belonging to a California sheriff’s department

title: Woman allegedly kidnapped off NYC street and driven away in minivan
description: A woman was allegedly kidnapped off a New York City street early Friday by a suspect who drove her away in a minivan, police said.

title: DeSantis seeks federal aid for Fort Lauderdale flood victims
description: DeSantis asks the Biden administration to declare Broward County a disaster area

title: 'Park outside': GM recalls 40,000 pickups to fix fire risk
description: GM recalls certain Chevrolet Silverado trucks for model year 2019 or later.

title: Longtime Trump ally Laxalt joins PAC supporting DeSantis
description: Adam Laxalt joins PAC encouraging DeSantis to seek the presidential nomination.

title: 23 million Americans face severe weather threat on East Coast
description: A severe thunderstorm watch has been issued for parts of Delaware, the District of Columbia, Maryland, North Carolina and Virginia until 6 p.m. ET Saturday.

title: WATCH:  Group of bears bounce on trampoline
description: BOUNCING BEARS: A group of bears enjoy some play time on a family trampoline in Connecticut.

title: 5 charged in youth game brawl; man later died of heart event
description: Vermont State Police say five adults have been charged with misdemeanor assault for a brawl that erupted at a middle school basketball game earlier this year

title: Djokovic to miss Madrid Open along with Nadal
description: The Madrid Open says that top-ranked Novak Djokovic will miss the Spanish tournament

title: Dame Edna creator Barry Humphries dies in Sydney at 89
description: Tony Award-winning comedian Barry Humphries, internationally renowned for his garish stage persona Dame Edna Everage, a condescending snob whose evolving character has delighted audiences over seven decades, has died

title: Explorers find WWII ship sunk with over 1,000 Allied POWs
description: Explorers have announced they found a sunken Japanese ship that was transporting Allied prisoners of war when it was torpedoed off the coast of the Philippines in 1942, resulting in Australia’s largest maritime wartime loss with a total of 1,080 lives

title: Sudan's army says evacuations of diplomats expected to begin
description: The Sudanese army says it's coordinating efforts to evacuate citizens and diplomats from the United States, Britain, China and France out of the country on military airplanes

title: Japan gets ready to shoot down N. Korea spy satellite debris
description: Japan’s defense chief has ordered troops to activate missile interceptors and get ready to shoot down fragments from a North Korean satellite that may fall on the Japanese territory

title: Farming valley scrambles to save future as Tulare Lake floods take over
description: The relentless downpour from this year's record rain season in California has caused a long-dormant lake to remerge after generations.

title: WATCH:  Dog dances with bride on her special day
description: A bride in Scotland took to the dance floor at her wedding with her cute bichon frise, where the two shared a sweet moment.

title: Mexico migrant camp tents torched across border from Texas
description: Witnesses say makeshift tents were deliberately set ablaze in a large camp of migrants in Mexico across the border from South Texas this week

title: New wave of GOP candidates to challenge Trump, DeSantis
description: A second wave of Republican candidates is preparing to enter the presidential race later this spring following a monthslong lull as the GOP field finally takes shape

title: Multiple people injured in Southeast, DC shooting: Police
description: Multiple people have been injured in a shooting Friday night in Washington, D.C, police said.

title: Manhattan DA Bragg, Jordan resolve legal dispute over Trump inquiry
description: Manhattan DA Alvin Bragg and Rep. Jim Jordan have resolved their legal dispute.

title: Texas man indicted for alleged threat to kill US Rep. Waters
description: A federal grand jury in Los Angeles has indicted a Houston man for allegedly calling the office of California U.S. Rep. Maxine Waters several times last year and leaving voice mails threatening to harm the Democratic congresswoman
